潤.definition: moist; glossy; sleek; to moisten; to lubricate; to embellish; to enhance; profit; remuneration; (neologism c. 2021) (slang) (loanword from "run") to emigrate (in order to flee adverse conditions)

潤學.definition: (neologism) (slang) study of how to flee from adverse conditions in China by emigrating

潤州.definition: Runzhou district of Zhenjiang city 鎮江市|镇江市[Zhen4 jiang1 shi4], Jiangsu

潤州區.definition: Runzhou district of Zhenjiang city 鎮江市|镇江市[Zhen4 jiang1 shi4], Jiangsu

潤格.definition: (old) scale of fees charged by a painter or calligrapher

潤濕.definition: to moisten (e.g. of rain); to wet

潤筆.definition: remuneration for literary or artistic work

潤肺.definition: to moisten the lungs; to make expectoration easy (medicine)

潤色.definition: to polish (a piece of writing); to add a few finishing touches to (a piece of writing, painting etc)

潤資.definition: remuneration for literary or artistic work

潤餅.definition: soft mixed vegetable and meat roll-up
